findings.details: Post breadcrumb trail can wrap into multiple lines on small screens, increasing vertical jump and reducing scanability.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan for placeholder or http:// links in templates/pages/posts found none.
Pages include title/description/keywords and use jekyll-seo-tag.
Posts and listings have consistent summaries and structured metadata.

recommendations: Improve mobile breadcrumb behavior to avoid multi-line jumps
Re-check external link availability when network access is available
